features.featureTitle: Update the app light theme to use a beige background with black (or near-black) foreground text by adjusting the light-mode CSS theme tokens in `frontend/src/index.css` (the `:root` block). Ensure the main surfaces (`--background`, `--card`, `--popover`, `--sidebar`) are beige-toned and that text tokens (`--foreground`, `--card-foreground`, `--popover-foreground`, `--sidebar-foreground`) resolve to black/near-black with accessible contrast.

Align light-mode interactive/accent tokens in `frontend/src/index.css` with the beige/black theme so buttons, borders, inputs, rings, and muted/secondary surfaces remain consistent and readable (e.g., `--primary`, `--primary-foreground`, `--secondary`, `--muted`, `--accent`, `--border`, `--input`, `--ring`). Keep the existing dark theme tokens unchanged unless they cause readability issues after the light-theme update.
